body:
### Welcome

This sample project is to have experience on jQuery Mobile 1.3.0 beta 1 version in combination with BackboneJS. Taking shopping cart as the main case, I reused most of the logic from my previous sample project http://rnugraha.github.com/ShoppingCartDemo. 

The idea is to have basic shopping cart features in gadget version whereas user can do following:
- browsing items from some categories
- add item to cart
- view shopping cart
- reset shopping cart
- remove item from shopping cart  

Live demo can be found in : http://www.spicevanjava.nl/shoppingCartMobile/

### GitHub Link

https://github.com/rnugraha/ShoppingCartMobile.git

### Source and Libraries

Shopping Cart Demo makes use of following libraries

jQuery (jquery-1.8.3.min.js)
- http://jquery.com/

jquery.tmpl (jquery.tmpl.js)
- http://github.com/jquery/jquery-tmpl

jquery-mobile (jquery.mobile-1.3.0-beta.1.min.js)
- http://jquerymobile.com/

underscore.js & backbone.js
- http://github.com/documentcloud/backbone
- http://github.com/documentcloud/underscore


### Contact
rnugraha@gmail.com
www.spicevanjava.nl
name: Shopping Cart Mobile
tagline: Shopping cart UI demo using jQuery Mobile 1.3.0 Beta and BackboneJS
